tier.item: "The clothes are hanging and getting dry." (Kohn 1994, ex. 177)
"The clothes are hanging and getting dry." (Kohn 1994, ex. 177)
The clothes are hanging and getting dry.
This talk is making me tired.
(22) Nyinta ngamun-wuntu paja-lku, ngayi nyarni paja-lku.
"You eat faster than me." (lit : "You eat fast, I eat slow.") (Kohn 1994, ex.176)
(22) Nyinta ngamun-wuntu paja-lku, ngayi nyarni paja-lku.
"You eat faster than me." (lit : "You eat fast, I eat slow.") (Kohn 1994, ex.176)
Nyinta ngamun-wuntu paja-lku, ngayi nyarni paja-lku.

tier.item: Pirrpi- lpatharn, pirrpi- lpatharn. Jirli pungka-ku wupu-ngka-pa
scrape HABIT scrape-HABIT spark fall-PRES container-LOC-EMPH
kurna-ngka-pa ngula. Kampa-ku juju-pa. Kampa-ku kurlukurlu.
charcoal-LOC-pa there burn-PRES smoke-pa burn-PRES little
"I (used to) get a stone -- a long thin one. I (used to) scrape it and scrape it. A spark
falls into the container, into the charcoal there. Smoke burns, a little smoke. I get grass,
crush it, crush some grass. I get the coal which is burning, put it on the grass, hold it in
the wind. A flame comes up." (Von Brandenstein, 1970:22-23)
Pirrpi- lpatharn, pirrpi- lpatharn. Jirli pungka-ku wupu-ngka-pa
scrape HABIT scrape-HABIT spark fall-PRES container-LOC-EMPH
kurna-ngka-pa ngula. Kampa-ku juju-pa. Kampa-ku kurlukurlu.
charcoal-LOC-pa there burn-PRES smoke-pa burn-PRES little
"I (used to) get a stone -- a long thin one. I (used to) scrape it and scrape it. A spark
falls into the container, into the charcoal there. Smoke burns, a little smoke. I get grass,
crush it, crush some grass. I get the coal which is burning, put it on the grass, hold it in
the wind. A flame comes up." (Von Brandenstein, 1970:22-23)

Marnta-yi thaka-lpatharn marnta-yi-- wanarra-la kurlukurlu. Pirrpi-lpatharn, pirrpi-lpatharn. Jirli pungka-ku wupu-ngka-pa kurna-ngka-pa ngula. Kampa-ku juju-pa. Kampa-ku kurlukurlu. Thaka-lku warrapa-ku, yurnduraka-lku, yurnduraka-lku warrapa-ku. Kurna-yi thaka-lku kampa-nha-ku, wantha-lku warrapa-la, kanyjini-ku thurta-ngka. Yurralyi-pa karlpa-ku.

stone-ACC get-HABIT stone-ACC long-LOC small scrape HABIT scrape-HABIT spark fall-PRES container-LOC-EMPH charcoal-LOC-pa there burn-PRES smoke-pa burn-PRES little get-PRES grass-ACC crush-PRES crush-PRES grass-ACC charcoal-ACC get-PRES light-PAST-ACC put-PRES grass-LOC hold-PRES wind-LOC flame-pa rise-PRES

I (used to) get a stone -- a long thin one. I (used to) scrape it and scrape it. A spark falls into the container, into the charcoal there. Smoke burns, a little smoke. I get grass, crush it, crush some grass. I get the coal which is burning, put it on the grass, hold it in the wind. A flame comes up.
"Those two sat watching the smoke burning."
"Those two sat watching the smoke burning."
Those two sat watching the smoke burning.
15) Yukuru-Ø pilya-na maNkula-ku 'A dog bit the child'
